member.name: IDXGIOutput.GetDesc
member.summary: Get a description of the output.
member.param: A pointer to the output description (see ).
member.returns: Returns a code that indicates success or failure. S_OK if successful, DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL if pDesc is passed in as NULL.

member.name: IDXGIOutput.GetFrameStatistics
member.summary: Gets statistics about recently rendered frames.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it might return DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL.

member.name: IDXGIOutput.GetGammaControl
member.param: An array of gamma control settings (see DXGI_GAMMA_CONTROL).
member.returns: Returns one of the DXGI_ERROR values.

member.name: IDXGIOutput.GetGammaControlCapabilities
member.summary: Gets a description of the gamma-control capabilities.
member.param: A pointer to a description of the gamma-control capabilities (see DXGI_GAMMA_CONTROL_CAPABILITIES).
member.returns: Returns one of the DXGI_ERROR values.

member.name: IDXGIOutput.SetDisplaySurface
member.param: A pointer to a surface (see ) used for rendering an image to the screen. The surface must have been created as a back buffer (DXGI_USAGE_BACKBUFFER).
member.returns: Returns one of the DXGI_ERROR values.

member.name: IDXGIOutput.SetGammaControl
member.param: A pointer to a DXGI_GAMMA_CONTROL structure that describes the gamma curve to set.
member.returns: Returns one of the DXGI_ERROR values.
